body:
Hi Mira and Orn,



Weather Analytics is another option if you are willing to pay:

[http://www.weatheranalytics.com/wa/products/data-weather-files/](http://www.weatheranalytics.com/wa/products/data-weather-files/)



You can also find some of the weather files generated from Meteonorm on EnergyPlus mailing list for free:

[https://groups.yahoo.com/neo/groups/EnergyPlus_Support/files/Meteon...](https://groups.yahoo.com/neo/groups/EnergyPlus_Support/files/Meteonorm_Weather_Files/)



Luckily Edinburgh was there. Attached!



Mostapha
